reviewText: I WANT TO SAY THAT THE AVON TRAINING DVD WAS EXCELLENT!  I LEARNED A LOT FROM WATCHING THE DVD!  I WAS ABLE TO JOT DOWN A LOT OF INFORMATION AN PENCIL AND PAPER!  I HOPE THAT IN THE NEAR FUTURE,THAT YOU AMAZON CAN GIVE MORE ASSTISTANCE IN FINDING MORE DVDS AND VIDEOS AND BOOKS!  THANK YOU AMAZON.COM  ELLA M SIMON!
